column3: Travis failure seems unrelated. Force pushed, added `optional` to `iscompressed`.
Huh, how did we have it end up like this, a silent merge conflict?\n\n(utACK, good catch)

@promag `getaddressinfo` in 0.17 doesn't have any `solvable` fields, so shouldn't be required.\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/0a0b2ea11fde7becbdd1c04205336c3a39bffbc0/src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp#L4149

Shouldn't this say pubkey?

```suggestion
            "  "iscompressed" : true|false,  (boolean, optional) If the pubkey is compressed
"
```
